document_data.mainbody:
he temple of Waukeen in Bezantur was a major center of worship of Waukeen in Thay.
This temple was located in Bezantur,
The temple was one of two major sites of Waukeen worship in Thay, the other being in Tyraturos. Waukeens faith was popular among the Thayan middle-class as of the mid&ndash14 century DR, which made the Red Wizards of Thay uneasy about how they should treat the church of Waukeen within their realm.
